tp.pr5.view.gui

Class InstructionsPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • tp.pr5.view.gui.InstructionsPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class InstructionsPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    InstructionsPanel contains one button for each command (except scan & radar), and the fields for the rotation and for the id. It need be able to access to the RobotPanel, in order to get the item from the inventory for commands drop and operate. It communicates direct to the RobotEngine for performing the commands.
    Author:
    Abel Serrano Juste
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
